name: Machine Phantasm
description:
This mini game was made possible with Godot Engine:


This game is a:

This game very miniature experience made by a solo indie game developer Miles Thatch (TheConceptBoy). It's entire gameplay is you being confined to one room and a few enemy spawners and couple of weapons. It is priced aggressively to deter random people from mistaking it for a complete experience, only to then realize it's a mini game and complain about lack of content. Do not buy it unless you are familiar with the developer and are explicitly making a decision to support them and their development endevours.

Welcome to Machine Phantasm. A tiny VR Arena Shooter. A mini game in a box, literally. Test how long can you make it against waves of primitive enemies.



Current Features
  • 3x Weapons
  • 2x Wrist Mounted Shotguns
  • 4x Holstering Zones
  • 2x Auto-deploy Magazines
  • 3x Enemy Types
  • Ammo & Heath Shop






Content:
  • Waves Game Mode
  • 10 Action Soundtracks
